pages.text: We now have BioDiesel, what's it use for?  Welp, time for another power generator - Diesel Generator. These materials are required:       x6 Steel Scaffolding          x5 Fluid Pipes         x1Redstone Engineering blocks  x13 Heavy Engineering Block   x4 Generator Block           x9 Radiator Blocks

pages.name: Diesel Generator
pages.text: To form it, right click the centre Generator Block, that's is the front face of the machine

There are two fluid input from 2 side right and left and there are 3 power inputs from the top at the front of the machine and a redstone panel to turn on/off it. This will help you to make a lots of power, up to 4096RF per 1 tick (20 ticks = 1 second ==> 1 tick = 0.05 second) Which means 81 920 RFs per second. That's a huge number
